body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Noteworthy, the leading music school. My name is Philip Williams. How can I assist you today?

Hi Philip, my name is Helen Scott. I'm interested in learning about your pricing for voice lessons.

Nice to meet you, Helen! Could you please tell me which level of lessons you are interested in—beginner, intermediate, or advanced?

I'm considering intermediate lessons.

Great choice, Helen! We offer a package of ten lessons for intermediate students. Could you provide your email address so I can send you detailed information?

Sure, my email address is helen.scott@email.com.

Thank you! Also, may I have your contact number in case we need to follow up?

Certainly, my contact number is five five five, two three four, one zero zero zero.

Thank you, Helen. I'll email you the pricing details and follow up if necessary. Do you have any other questions for now?

No, that would be all for now. Thank you, Philip!

You're welcome, Helen. Thank you for reaching out to Noteworthy. Have a great day!
